ygData.subject: RE: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah - I camp bugs in Sol B for hours and get a chitin bp.. hrmmm give it to some newbie druid or twink it to mine?? Puh-lease... And just so you don t
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah - I camp bugs in Sol B for hours and get a chitin bp.. hrmmm give it
to some newbie druid or twink it to mine?? Puh-lease...

And just so you don't think i'm some greedy bastard, I have given the
following items away from memory (to friends mind you):

Silver Legplates
Serrated Bone Dirk
Obsidian Shard
FBR
Countless INT buffing items
Shimmering Orb
Molten Cloak!
Bloodclaw
Crystalline Blade
Thulian Claws
Tons and tons of bronze paperweights
Staff of Writhing
Erudite Heart Amulet
etc etc etc
Not to mention the 1 million LJ vests I've randomly given to newbies in
Oasis, and tons of quest components I've let complete strangers loot.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan
